items.name: The Majestic Mountain Fortress of Thaba Bosiu
items.short_description: Climb this historic flat-topped mountain, a symbol of Basotho resilience and independence, offering panoramic views and ancient ruins. Discover the spiritual heartland of the Basotho nation.

items.name: Scenic Caledon River Overlook (Maseru Bridge)
items.short_description: Witness the flow of the Caledon River with sweeping views of the border landscape and distant Maloti Mountains from the Maseru Bridge area. It offers a glimpse into the natural beauty surrounding the capital.

items.name: The Iconic Basotho Hat Building (Mokorotlo)
items.short_description: Capture the unique design of this hat-shaped building, a vibrant architectural homage to Lesotho's national symbol, the mokorotlo. It's a testament to Basotho identity and craftsmanship.

items.name: Grand Maseru Cathedral of Our Lady of Victory
items.short_description: Marvel at the striking architecture of Maseru's prominent Roman Catholic cathedral, a serene sanctuary in the heart of the city. Its twin spires offer a picturesque backdrop.
